Feature Description:: The «NINT'FV'D» (NonIntentive Focus-on-Verb Declarative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_NINT'FV'D (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «NINT'FV'D» Tone Pattern)

The «NINT'FV'Q» (NonIntentive Focus-on-Verb Interrogative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_NINT'FV'Q (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «NINT'FV'Q» Tone Pattern)

The «NINT'FN'D» (NonIntentive Focus-on-NP Declarative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_NINT'FN'D (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «NINT'FN'D» Tone Pattern)

The «NINT'FN'Q» (NonIntentive Focus-on-NP Interrogative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_NINT'FN'Q (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «NINT'FN'Q» Tone Pattern)

The «NINT'EO» (NonIntentive Emphasis on Object) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_NINT'EO (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «NINT'EO» Tone Pattern)

The «INT'FV'D» (Intentive Focus-on-Verb Declarative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_INT'FV'D (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «INT'FV'D» Tone Pattern)

The «INT'FV'Q» (Intentive Focus-on-Verb Interrogative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_INT'FV'Q (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «INT'FV'Q» Tone Pattern)

The «INT'FN'D» (Intentive Focus-on-NP Declarative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_INT'FN'D (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «INT'FN'D» Tone Pattern)

The «INT'FN'Q» (Intentive Focus-on-NP Interrogative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_INT'FN'Q (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «INT'FN'Q» Tone Pattern)

The «INT'EO» (Intentive Emphasis on Object) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_INT'EO (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «INT'EO» Tone Pattern)
The «SUB» (Subordinative) Tone Pattern requires a Verb Subject Prefix that has the feature TP_SUB (i.e. Verb Subject Prefixes that have this feature can have a «SUB» Tone Pattern)
